title: Anomalous superionic conductivity in van der Waals lithium thiophosphates triggered by interlayer molecules
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00500G, Paper
Jianing Liang, Yu Wu, Zongdong Sun, Cheng Zeng, Youwen Liu, Yinghe Zhao, Tianyou Zhai, Huiqiao Li
Layered LiInP2S6 can trigger an anomalous superionic conductivity of 5.3 × 10−3 S cm−1 in a solid hydrated phase by interlayer molecules uptake, which is enhanced by more than four orders of magnitude compared to that in an anhydrous phase.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
